title: Mage
contents: property | Armor class | 12 (15 with mage armor)

description | Spellcasting | The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared.
description | Cantrips (at will) | fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
description | 1st level (4 slots) | detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
description | 2nd level (3 slots) | misty step, suggestion
description | 4th level (3 slots) | greater invisibility, ice storm
description | 5th level (1 slot) | cone of cold
description | Dagger | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20f60 ft. , one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
